name: MICROWORLD (Just Another Game)
description:
The game is available on Google Play

MICROWORLD 2D 2D casual arcade game about microlife. You are a small living being. Your task is to eat small cells and grow, but know that you cannot miss. MicroWorld is a casual arcade game with casual gameplay and music. Try not to die and score as many points as possible. Simple one-click controls will not make you nervous and understand the game. It is enough to be attentive. Don't strain yourself. Relax.

The game is available on Google Play

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.micro.virus
